alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 12:23AM CST until February 16 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Franklin County in west central Arkansas... * Until 115 AM CST. * At 1223 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Fern, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... St. Paul... Cass... Saint Paul... Pettigrew... Boston... Dutton... Jethro... Barnes... Red Star... Redding... Watalula... Brashears... Turners Bend... Lonelm... Taft... Cravens... Paradise... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
